lines.text: John wakes up with a yawn, which is soon followed by the sounds of his lips smacking together.
A soft snort escapes him. His voice sounds tired.
Huh? Oh, I'd better get up and feed Miso.
Ah! There you are. Good morning, Miso. How are you doing today?
Miso replies with a meow.
He's sitting on the kitchen counter, ready to be fed.
Oh, are you waiting for your breakfast? Are you trying to tell me that you are starving, boy?
Miso replies with a chipper meow. He looks happy to be there. His tail swaying from side to side.
That's what I thought. Always acting like you don't get fed. What an awful owner I am!
A series of grunts is followed. John is hunting for the piece of paper left with instructions on what to feed Miso.
Where is this piece of paper she left? I'm always losing things.. Miso, wanna tell me what you want?
Miso does not reply, simply stares.
I didn't think so.. Well, it seems I'm going to have to guess what you like. Such a fussy wee lad, you are.
Miso meows at that.
I'm glad you agree with me.
John opens the kitchen cabinet and starts looking for food. He finds a few options.
Oh, this beef has real gravy in it. Doesn't that sound nice, boy?
Miso stares. John proceeds to give Miso a bowl of wet, beef food. This causes a negative reaction from the cat.
You don't like that? Uh..
Miso does not look happy. He's up to something.
Wait. Miso, no! Not the..
Miso proceeds to drop a glass from the counter, and it lands on the floor.
..Glass.
I shouldâ€™ve kept that piece of paper.
Miso does not like beef. Mhm.. What to give you?
John thinks. Miso is showcased as being unhappy, a bit grumpy-looking.
John chooses fish with a dry mix.
You can never go wrong with fish. Maybe we'll add this dry mix. That'll fill you up.
Miso looks to be incredibly annoyed.
Okay, that was a no on the fish, and I just remembered... You do not like dry food.
A long meow escapes Miso from a distance.
Miso. Wait.. Where did you go?
Miso has vanished. John can hear a noise of fabric ripping.
Wait, Miso! No! Not the couch!
Okay, how about Chicken? This seems like a good choice.
John chooses Chicken. Miso is instantly happy about this choice.
Hey! I did it, Miso! Oh, is that tasty, huh?
Miso finishes his food, and he is happy.
Did you enjoy that, boy? Wanna snuggle on the couch and watch TV with me?
Miso lets out a contented meow in response.
Yeah, okay. Let's go then.
